languages.text: "Религиозные и трудолюбивые... Зауэрбэки владеют множеством предприятий, в том числе — перегонными мануфакторумами по выработке прометия. Должен отметить, что в последнее время представители семейства позволяют себе слишком вольные высказывания о династии фон Валанциус — с их точки зрения, Леди Теодора слишком часто оставляла свои миры без присмотра".

traits.locale_text: "Религиозные и трудолюбивые... Зауэрбэки владеют множеством предприятий на мире Гордость Сантиэля, в том числе — перегонными мануфакторумами по выработке прометиума. Ныне их положение пошатнулось — с утратой всех контактов с миром-ульем и прерыванием поставок их будущее не столь очевидно и обеспечено, как раньше. Должен отметить, что в последнее время представители семейства позволяют себе слишком вольные высказывания о династии фон Валанциус — с их точки зрения, леди Теодора оставила Гордость Сантиэля и своих слуг в самый темный час, что и привело к нынешним проблемам".

languages.text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."
languages.original_text: "Религиозные и трудолюбивые... Зауэрбэки владеют множеством предприятий, в том числе — перегонными мануфакторумами по выработке прометия. Должен отметить, что в последнее время представители семейства позволяют себе слишком вольные высказывания о династии фон Валанциус — с их точки зрения, Леди Теодора слишком часто оставляла свои миры без присмотра".

traits.locale_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Zowerbacks own many enterprises on the world Santiel's Pride, including the distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. Their present position is rather unstable — with all contact with the hive world lost and the shipments disrupted, their future is not as certain and secure as it once was. I must note that lately members of the Zowerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora abandoned Santiel's Pride and her servants in the darkest hour, which is what's led to their current troubles."

"Religious and hardworking... The Zowerbacks own many enterprises on the world Santiel's Pride, including the distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora is a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora is a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

"Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora is a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

languages.text: “他们虔诚而勤奋……苏尔贝克家族拥有许多企业，其中包括用来生产钷素的蒸馏制造工厂。我必须指出一点，最近，苏尔贝克家族的成员倾向于对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝发表过于自由的言论。他们认为西奥多拉夫人有点过于热衷离开她的世界，没有对她的世界进行合适的监管。”
languages.original_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

traits.locale_text: “他们虔诚而勤奋……苏尔贝克家族拥有许多企业，其中包括用来生产钷素的蒸馏制造工厂。我必须指出一点，最近，苏尔贝克家族的成员倾向于对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝发表过于自由的言论。他们认为西奥多拉夫人有点过于热衷离开她的世界，没有对她的世界进行合适的监管。”

languages.text: «Son religiosos y trabajadores... Los Sauerback tienen numerosas empresas, incluyendo manufactorum-destilerías que producen el prometio. Debo mencionar que últimamente los miembros de la familia Sauerback han hecho declaraciones un tanto liberales con respecto a la dinastía von Valancius. Creen que lady Theodora estaba demasiado dispuesta a dejar sus mundos sin una supervisión adecuada».
languages.original_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

traits.locale_text: «Son religiosos y trabajadores... Los Sauerback tienen numerosas empresas, incluyendo manufactorum-destilerías que producen el prometio. Debo mencionar que últimamente los miembros de la familia Sauerback han hecho declaraciones un tanto liberales con respecto a la dinastía von Valancius. Creen que lady Theodora estaba demasiado dispuesta a dejar sus mundos sin una supervisión adecuada».

languages.text: 「敬虔にして勤勉…ザウアーバック家は多くの事業を行っており、その中にはプロメチウムを製造する蒸留聖工場も含まれています。お伝えしておかなければいけないのは、最近、ザウアーバック一族の面々は、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝に対して自由主義的な意見を述べる傾向があり、彼らの考えでは、シオドーラ様は自分の星々をきちんと管理せずに少々放任しすぎるとのことです」
languages.original_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

traits.locale_text: 「敬虔にして勤勉…ザウアーバック家は多くの事業を行っており、その中にはプロメチウムを製造する蒸留聖工場も含まれています。お伝えしておかなければいけないのは、最近、ザウアーバック一族の面々は、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝に対して自由主義的な意見を述べる傾向があり、彼らの考えでは、シオドーラ様は自分の星々をきちんと管理せずに少々放任しすぎるとのことです」

languages.text: "Religiös und fleißig ... Die Sauerbacks besitzen zahlreiche Unternehmen wie die Destillationsmanufactorien, die Promethium herstellen. Anzumerken wäre, dass Angehörige der Familie Sauerback sich seit einiger Zeit deutlich zu freimütig über die Dynastie von Valancius äußern – sie glauben, Lady Theodora nahm es auf ihren Welten mit der Aufsicht nicht genau genug."
languages.original_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

traits.locale_text: "Religiös und fleißig ... Die Sauerbacks besitzen zahlreiche Unternehmen wie die Destillationsmanufactorien, die Promethium herstellen. Anzumerken wäre, dass Angehörige der Familie Sauerback sich seit einiger Zeit deutlich zu freimütig über die Dynastie von Valancius äußern – sie glauben, Lady Theodora nahm es auf ihren Welten mit der Aufsicht nicht genau genug."

languages.text: « Ces gens font preuve d'autant de bigoterie que de diligence dans leur travail. Les Sauerback sont à la tête de nombreuses entreprises, notamment des manufactorums qui produisent du prométhium. Je me permets néanmoins d'ajouter que ces derniers temps, les membres de la famille Sauerback se sont permis quelques commentaires libéraux sur la dynastie von Valancius. Ils ont ainsi sous-entendu que Dame Théodora avait tendance à laisser les mondes sous sa responsabilité sans supervision adéquate. »
languages.original_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

traits.locale_text: « Ces gens font preuve d'autant de bigoterie que de diligence dans leur travail. Les Sauerback sont à la tête de nombreuses entreprises, notamment des manufactorums qui produisent du prométhium. Je me permets néanmoins d'ajouter que ces derniers temps, les membres de la famille Sauerback se sont permis quelques commentaires libéraux sur la dynastie von Valancius. Ils ont ainsi sous-entendu que Dame Théodora avait tendance à laisser les mondes sous sa responsabilité sans supervision adéquate. »

languages.text: "Dindar ve çalışkandırlar. Sauerbacklerin, aralarında prometyum üreten damıtma manufaktorumları da bulunan birçok girişimleri vardır. Sauerback mensuplarının, son zamanlarda von Valancius hanedanlığı hakkında fazlasıyla liberal bazı açıklamalar yapma eğiliminde olduğunu da not etmeliyim. Leydi Theodora'nın, himayesindeki dünyaları yeterli gözetim kurmaksızın kendi hâline bırakmaya fazla hevesli olduğuna inanıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Religious and hardworking... The Sauerbacks own many enterprises, including distillation manufactorums that produce promethium. I must note that lately members of the Sauerback family have been prone to overly liberal statements about the von Valancius dynasty — they believe that Lady Theodora was a bit too keen to leave her worlds without proper oversight."

Sauerback mensuplarının, son zamanlarda von Valancius hanedanlığı hakkında fazlasıyla liberal bazı açıklamalar yapma eğiliminde olduğunu da not etmeliyim.
